message:
The Muslim Brotherhood, Nazis and Al-Qaeda, Holocaust, Kim Philby, Saudi Arabia, sleeping with the devil, facists, financing terror

‎"During the '50s, the CIA evacuated Nazis of the Muslim Brotherhood to Saudi Arabia... & there combined the doctrines of Nazism with this weird Islamic cult, Wahhabiism.... [which] was only practiced by 2 nations, the Taliban & Saudi Arabia.... fascism & extremism were mingled in these schools & there was a young student who paid attention... Osama Bin Ladin."

http://www.canadafreepress.com/2006/loftus101106.htm
